choose.when: INSERT INTO d_user_password (name, password, email, usertype, way, create_time, update_time, activation, biz_verify, phone_verify) VALUE (#{name}, #{password}, #{email}, #{usertype}, #{way}, #{create_time}, #{update_time}, #{activation}, #{biz_verify}, #{phone_verify})
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO d_user_password (name, password, usertype, way, create_time, update_time, activation, biz_verify, phone_verify,phone) VALUE (#{name}, #{password}, #{usertype}, #{way}, #{create_time}, #{update_time}, #{activation}, #{biz_verify}, #{phone_verify},#{phone})

mapper.update: UPDATE d_user_password SET update_time = #{update_time} ,email = #{email} WHERE id = #{id}
